column3: College of Business, Law and Social Sciences
column5: International business and marketing is a powerful combination if you have set your sights on a high-flying career in a leading global organisation. Our MSc equips you with the vision, professional credibility, practical skills and specialist knowledge you need to excel.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2-3 years part time
